name: HKObserverQuery
desc: A long-running query that monitors the HealthKit store and updates your app when the HealthKit store saves or deletes a matching sample.

items.name: init(sampleType: HKSampleType, predicate: NSPredicate?, updateHandler: (HKObserverQuery, HKObserverQueryCompletionHandler, Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Instantiates and returns a query that monitors the HealthKit store and responds to changes.

items.name: init(queryDescriptors: [HKQueryDescriptor], updateHandler: (HKObserverQuery, Set<HKSampleType>?, HKObserverQueryCompletionHandler, Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Creates a query that monitors the HealthKit store and responds to any changes matching any of the query descriptors you provided.

items.name: typealias HKObserverQueryCompletionHandler
items.desc: The completion handler for background deliveries.
